title: The Architecture of Insufficient Rescue
prompt: An overhead view of weathered hands gripping the steering wheel of an older pickup truck on a rural two-lane highway at dawn, dashboard casting long shadows, sparse pine trees and flat farmland visible through the windshield in soft golden light. The photograph captures the worn interior—cracked vinyl, dust on the dashboard—with documentary precision, conveying exhaustion and isolation without sentimentality. Shot from inside the cab to emphasize the solitude of the journey and the distance between here and help.
